controlChangeCommands.name: Freeze Bypass
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Glitch Bypass
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Alt Menu
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: ALT exit = 0, ALT enter = 1 or higher (hold both switches)

controlChangeCommands.name: Glitch Hold
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher (hold left switch)

controlChangeCommands.name: Freeze Hold
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher (hold right switch)

controlChangeCommands.name: Retrigger Glitch
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send any value to retrigger glitch

controlChangeCommands.name: Retrigger Freeze
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send any value to retrigger freeze

controlChangeCommands.name: Error Type
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: TIMING = 0–1, CONDITION = 2, PLAYBACK = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Fade
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: LONG = 0–1, USER = 2, SHORT = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Animate
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: VIBRATO = 0–1, OFF = 2, CHORUS = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Size DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Error DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Sustain DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Texture DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Octave DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Bounce DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Sweep DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; B = 0, T = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Polarity DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: left bank; F = 0, R = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Miso DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Spread DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Latch DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Sidechain DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Duck DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Reverse DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Half Speed DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Manual DIP
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: right bank; off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Error Routing
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: GLITCH = 0–1, BOTH = 2, FREEZE = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Sustain Routing
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: GLITCH = 0–1, BOTH = 2, FREEZE = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Effects Routing
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: GLITCH = 0–1, BOTH = 2, FREEZE = 3 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: EOM (Expression Over MIDI)
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: 0 = heel, 127 = toe

controlChangeCommands.name: Preset Save
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send preset number (1–122) while holding both footswitches

controlChangeCommands.name: MIDI Clock Ignore
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: 0 = ignore, >0 = follow clock

controlChangeCommands.name: Ramp/Bounce
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: MIDI Sync Subdivision
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: 0–8 map to specific note values

controlChangeCommands.name: Factory Reset
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send any value (see manual for full procedure)

controlChangeCommands.name: Dry Kill
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Trails
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: off = 0, on = 1 or higher

controlChangeCommands.name: Tap Tempo
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send any value to tap (alt CC, shared with 107)

controlChangeCommands.name: Tap Tempo (Alt)
controlChangeCommands.additionalInfo: send any value to tap (alternate CC number)
